name: RulesofAcquisitionfrom"StarTrek"(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, ask rules of acquisition for a rule.”
”Tell me a random rule.”
”What is rule 34?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rules of acquisition
des: Abide by the Rules of Acquisition and untold wealth may be yours. You may ask for specific rules or request a random rule. Non-canon rules are included, for a total of 285 profit-maximizing proverbs. And remember, "When no appropriate rule applies... make one up."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
